# cmccloudv2_autoscaling_scale_in_policy (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cooldown` (Number) Length in number of seconds before the actual deletion happens, This param buys an instance some time before deletion
- `name` (String)
- `scale_number` (Number)
- `scale_type` (String) One of follow values: CHANGE_IN_CAPACITY,EXACT_CAPACITY,CHANGE_IN_CAPACITY,CHANGE_IN_PERCENTAGE

### Optional

- `timeouts` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--timeouts))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
